description.ko: 순수한 빛이 기하학적 유리와 만나 색의 분리와 수정처럼 맑은 투명함을 보여주는 광학 물리학의 경이로운 순간을 탐구합니다.
description.en: An exploration of optical physics where pure light meets geometric glass, resulting in a breathtaking display of color separation and crystalline clarity.

prompt: A high-precision triangular glass prism capturing a single beam of intense white light, refracting it into a vivid and expanded rainbow spectrum. The background is a dark, minimalist studio setting with subtle dust particles dancing in the light. Hyper-realistic textures, volumetric lighting, 8k resolution, macro photography style, sharp edges, and chromatic aberration effects.
